title: Best man pulls hilarious prank on groom by dressing up as bride for first look

A man pulled a hilarious prank on his best friend when he dressed up as the bride on his wedding day.

Billy Hunt was nervously preparing himself to see his bride Sally for the first time on their special day when his best friend showed up in a white wedding gown.

At first, he can be seen walking towards Billy, who has no idea of the sight that awaited him.

When the unsuspecting groom asks the photographer whether he can turn around to see his bride, he is greeted with the surprising image of his best man, Pat Jones, in a wedding dress.

He soon starts laughing loudly as he tells his friend: "I can't even look at you."

Billy even kneels down and struggles to control his laughter.

(Image: Caters News Agency)

Pat holds his dress and even adjusts it in order to look like a perfect bride.

Eventually, Sally arrives in her wedding dress and the two are filmed kissing and hugging in front of their family and friends, while they tie the knot.

The hilarious prank, at Little Creek Park in South Charleston, West Virginia was captured on camera on August 24.

(Image: Caters News Agency)

Videographer for the wedding, Andrew Craig Stevens, 35, said: "We were not in on it. It was the bride's idea.

"I tried to stay calm and not give it away and to also keep the shot steady."

"The rest of the wedding was much the same, a lot of fun personalities and laughs."
description: Billy Hunt was shocked to see his best friend, Pat Jones, in a white bridal gown when he turned around on his wedding day
